invocations.description: Reconnects you to the game world on last character played. If you pass true for usectrlg, it will reconnect by pressing Ctrl+G; this is specially useful when your connection times out and you're not sent back to the login screen.
invocations.ex:
auto(2500)
if not $connected then
	reconnect()
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 2500 milliseconds, it will check if you are connected. If not, it will reconnect to the last character you logged in.

invocations.description: Reconnects the character named charname on the same account it was last used to the game world.
